top.title: A 10-year-old, two rabbis and a Holocaust survivor - Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
top.summary: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

top.title: How Bondi's Hanukkah festival turned from joy to horror within minutes
top.summary: Videos and eyewitness accounts reveal how Australia's worst mass shooting in nearly three decades unfolded.

top.title: FBI foils New Year's Eve terror plot across southern California, officials say
top.summary: Four people are facing conspiracy charges after they were apprehended while planning to test explosives in the desert.

top.title: UK launches taskforce to 'break down barriers' for women in technology
top.summary: It comes after the government was urged to help close the UK tech sector's gender gap in order to meet its ambitious AI goals.

top.title: Amazon apologises after showing 15-rated film to child who rented PG movie
top.summary: The child was trying to watch Diary of a Wimpy Kid - but a film with "strong sex and sex references" played instead.

top.title: Ofcom investigates BT and Three for failing to connect 999 calls
top.summary: The companies have been fined in the past over outages leaving customers unable to call emergency services.
